title: Playground (TEFC)
creator_credit: University of California, Los Angeles, David Grieve and Torben Strandgaard
brief_description: Employs live action, still photographs, animation and split frame techniques to show how creative playgrounds provide opportunities for children to build their own play environments and enjoy their creations in a non-regimented atmosphere.
creator_credit_for_label: University of California, Los Angeles, David Grieve and Torben Strandgaard
